kickbotdx.title: Kick Bot DX
kickbotdx.logo-alt: Kick Bot DX from Two Scoop Games.
kickbotdx.pitch: An infinite wall-jumping game where you send different types of unlockable robots to their doom for...  research purposes.
kickbotdx.release-statement: Coming soon to Mobile and PC.

syrush.title: SyRUSH
syrush.tagline: The official Waffle simulator of breakfast!
syrush.pitch: Feel the rush in this fast-paced arcade style game where you tap waffle squares to fill your waffle with the perfect distribution of mouth-watering toppings.
syrush.description: Feel the rush in this fast-paced arcade style game where you tap waffle squares to fill your waffle with the perfect distribution of mouth-watering toppings.
syrush.release-statement: Available on iPhone, iPad, & iPod Touch.

scurry.title: Scurry
scurry.pitch: Scurry is a game where you play as a cockroach who is running through a grocery store, avoid obstacles, get sweet power-ups, and try not to fall! Try to get a high score and beat your friends!
scurry.release-statement: Available on iPhone, iPad, & iPod Touch.

kickbot.title: Kick Bot
kickbot.logo-alt: Kick Bot - A game that will really kick your bot! from Two Scoop Games.
kickbot.tagline: A game that will really kick your bot!
kickbot.pitch: This game is all about quick reflexes and fast action. Maneuver through a procedurally-generated terrain of obstacles like spikes and laser beams. One wrong move and you’re a heap of metal. This game will drive you up the wall!
kickbot.release-statement: Available now on the Chrome Web Store and Itch.io!

clusterjunk.title: Cluster Junk
clusterjunk.description: There are millions of tons of trash floating in the oceans. So what goes on while no one is looking in these trash piles? Explore the garbage of humans and try to become the largest trash island in the sea! But hurry, don't let the timer run out!

stanleysqueaks.title: Stanley Squeaks and the Emerald Burrito
stanleysqueaks.pitch: Help Stanley solve puzzles and avoid traps in an ancient temple while on a quest to obtain the elusive emerald burrito.
stanleysqueaks.release-statement: Available now to play in your browser.
stanleysqueaks.description: Stanley Squeaks is an adventuring hamster on a quest to obtain the Emerald Burrito. Help Stanley solve puzzles and avoid traps in an ancient temple. This game is a puzzle platformer where the blocks you touch on the way to the treasure are destroyed on the way out, making it difficult to get out alive!

thedaytheworldchanged.title: The Day the World Changed
thedaytheworldchanged.tagline: One event can change a lifetime
thedaytheworldchanged.description: The Day the World Changed is a somber reflection on the troubles a new baby can bring to a family and how it can affect the whole community.

desserts.title: Desserts Killed Your Daddy
desserts.description: Defeat as many desserts as possible while keeping your health up with hearts. Enemies you will face are: 3 types of cake turtles, 4 types of walking cookies, and the terrifying GINGERBOSS! Can you get to 50 points and defeat the GINGERBOSS? Cans have a chance of containing a heart which you will need to refill your health. Game created for the Ludum Dare 31 Game Jam December 2014.
desserts.pitch: Can you get to 50 points and defeat the GINGERBOSS?
desserts.release-statement: Available now to play in your browser.

fluffykins.title: Mr. Fluffykins' Great Sorting Adventure
fluffykins.tagline: AKA Where Your Internet Comes From
fluffykins.description: ​Take a peek inside your home internet router to see how all those crazy cat pictures actually get to your computer. Play as Mr. Fluffykins, the cat who sorts your email and deletes your spam. Try to keep the data flowing as long as you can! This game is a Two Scoop collaboration with team Pancake, our Ludum Dare 29 team which consisted of: Aaron Smith, Alex Bezuska, Anthony Quisenberry, Eric Lathrop, Rex Soriano, and Nathan Hutchens.​
fluffykins.pitch: ​Take a peek inside your home internet router to see how all those crazy cat pictures actually get to your computer.
fluffykins.release-statement: Available now to play in your browser.

apartment213.title: Apartment 213
apartment213.description: This is a game about the ways several characters see the small apartment that their lives cross in. You start from the perspective of a small mouse and slowly switch perspectives with the antagonist of each character's own personal stories. These stories are colored by personal bias and each character's own concept of the apartment they interact in reveals more about that character than it does the apartment itself.
apartment213.pitch: A game about the ways several characters see the small apartment that their lives cross in.
apartment213.release-statement: Available now to play in your browser.

jam.title: Global Game Jam 2014
jam.theme: we don't see things as they are, we see them as we are
jam.description: The official Global Game Jam page for Apartment 213.
